name: Don't Nod In The Mirror
description:
Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2

This game is about you, a happy little block that was just ready to hang out with their friends(ganger buddies, youtuber fans, or video game characters) when a magic mirror cursed you and trapped you inside. This strange world have rewinders that undo stuff and fast-forwarders to get things going. Can you beat level 10 to escape?

Note: there are two hidden easter eggs(actual easter eggs from easter). Let me know if you collected them.

There are 10 levels and 6 cool skins to choose from. One of my characters may be a blurry screenshot from geometry dash, but shhhh.
